name: badged
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A badged person has a badge (= a small piece of metal or plastic carried or fastened to clothing) that shows who they are or that they belong to an organization or group: Only passengers with tickets and badged airport employees are allowed past security checkpoints.
A badged piece of clothing has a symbol or mark sewn onto it that shows which organization or group the person who wears it belongs to: All team members are given a badged blazer.
More examplesFewer examplesOnly badged employees could get into the building.He looks like a postman in his badged cap.Some of them wear badged polo shirts.Most primary schools have a simple uniform of a badged sweatshirt in a designated colour.
